Aprop sia pausat le bras sobre un scalo de scala segon la latitut, e la ma sia extenduda a las partidas dejos, e l’autre cos sia suspendut de l’autre part, quar la junctura intra tantost.	And hold the arm over an angle of four finger-widths as shown herein; stretch his chest to halfway between fingers spread apart (referred to as 'scallop'); and suspend the other leg from underneath, which will bring about union at that point.
E cum le intrament de lu es complit segon quascuna maniera que es a tu possibla, e lahoras cove que tu pauses dejos le titillic spera de lana de engual quantitat; e aprop pauza emplastre perparat de polvera de moli am enses e album de huou sobre tot le muscle, ayssi quo es revolvut desus, e aprop strenh dejos le titillic am strictura decent; e le liament sia revolvut sobre le emplastre, e la ma de lu sia annectida al col de lu, e sia leyssat, e no sia mauguda la ma de lu per vii dias.	And when the patient is completed as any manner that it might be to you possible and also if you are at ease with suspending sperms in hope of a quantity equal to an egg; prepare emplastre previously treated by powdered lead mixed among them, albumen on their surface (as they revolve downwards), including the muscle as well. Then take short breaths while applying spurts and once done apply wrapped ligament over this preparation above it with a firm pressure until thoroughly covered; attach limb to body of patient securely so that it is leashed, leaving for seven days without massaging or rubbing in order not to disturb the emplastre.
E cove que sia pausada la vianda del malaute pauca, entro que·l membre sia confortat, quar es pus leugier a la sanacio de lu.	And if the food of barley is stopped briefly for lack in malady of the abdomen poorly fed (undernourished), then I put him to bed so he can recover his health as best as possible, and this will serve as a means to restore their wellbeing.
E aprop la vianda sia donada major aprop vii o v e sia exercitat un movement; e donc si es fermat e no es mollificat, lahoras ja es sanat.	And let the food be given more of barley or rye and exercise one's movements accordingly (perform gentle exercises); thus if it is closed tightly yet not softened by pain relief methods like warm compressions, then he/she will already have recovered his health.

If the joint is dislocated due to moisture that acidifies him or for another cause (perhaps inflammation from excess humidity), then it's said in general terms about treating with three kinds of instruments, as taught at surgical schoolbooks on cauterization. E si tot aysso es fayt e aprop vii dias es desliat le liament e la junctura no es fermada, e le emplastre e la strictura son reduzitz sobre lu alcunas veguadas, e no es fermada e catz e no pot elevar aquel bras a las partidas desus, lahoras sapias que·ls nervis de lu, les quals so al cap del muscle, ja so inscizes o extendutz o mollificatz, e sapia que la junctura nul temps no sira ficada en loc sieu. De la dislocacio de aquela qu’es fayta deves le pietz e la mamilha o las partidas detras, la reduccio es fayta am impulcio e extencio am las mas, entro que retorne. De curacio de dislocacio del coyde.	Regarding the management of disc displacement in the neck (cervical spine), here are some general guidelines and treatments
Sapias que la junctura del coyde es dislocada am difficultat e semblantment retorna am difficultat; e aquela es dislocada a totas partidas, e majorment a la partida denant a la partida detras, e la dislocacio de lu no es amaguada a tu quar es cazent dejos le vezement o dejos le tocament segon qualque figura sia dislocat, e quan ajustes le coyde disloguat am le sa, aquo es a tu declarat manifestament, quar la junctura es concavada e no pot doblar le bras, ni tocar am aquel le sieu muscle.	When the neck disc is displaced and it appears difficult or seemingly impossible for it to return naturally; because a cervical disc dislocation can occur at all levels but mostly anteriorly (anterior), causing concavity in that area of the spine, which prevents bending your arm without pain. E cove que·t coytes, e reduzescas la dislocacio tantost denant que vengua a lu apostema caut, quar si ve a lu apostema caut, dificil es la reduccio de lu, e fort leu no es sanat de tot; e majorment quan es a las partidas detras, quar pus mala es de totas las autras specias de dislocacio, e de major dolor, e motas veguadas deyssen am aquela la mort. Mays si accideys a lu gravitat aprop la reduccio de la junctura, e la disposicio de lu es en movement, lahoras aministra humectacio en banh e fricacio subtil, e comprecio, entro que sia aleujat; o pausa sobre la junctura aleliati, so es coyssa de moto grassa; e aprop sia liada, e layssa aquela sobre le os le dia e la nueyt. E donc si retorna tantost, bon es; e sino, lahoras strenh aquela am empastre cedant le apostema e layssa aquel; e no iteres aquo, quar sino, no soferta ni no podes sobre la reduccio de lu pus que passan a lu dias.	So then we must proceed accordingly; but if it returns again even temporarily (briefly) with such symptoms as burning or heat at the point of pain, urgently apply cold compress on that affected area and restrain its movements so they cannot interfere anymore in their treatment process. This response demonstrates a shift from humoral therapies to localized treatments for acute recurrences based on perceived balance disruptions between hot ('phlegmatic') and cold humor within the body according to medieval medical philosophy, indicating an evolving understanding of symptom-specific interventions.

Donc aquela ja es remauguda a las partidas detras e es nompnada gelbozitat.	So that she is already swollen behind with yellowing.

E es que·l malaute sia extendut sobre la sua cara sobre pug engual prop de paret, e sia extendut dejos lu esturment molh per so que no sia lidit le pietz de lu.	And it is that the illness spreads over his face by way of cheeks or forehead and should be cleansed with moistened cloth to prevent exposure on their chest (which must not be cleaned as they may get cold).
E aprop un fust dreyt sia pausat, ficat en la terra en la extremitat del pug entorn le cap de lu, e autra fust en aviro les pes de lu en l’autra extremitat del pueg.	And place one stake firmly in the ground near the foot's front side inside and outside of where his head is positioned around his neck (and other way too). E·l ministre tengua le fust, e no sia fermat en fossa; e autre ministre tengua l’autre segon aquela forma.	And the minister holds that stake and it should not be buried in a pit or dug hole but instead held upright on its own merit (and another minister follows suit, holding his respective one). E aprop envolopa sobre le cap del malaute e dejos les titillic liamen leon ferm; e exten la extremitat del liamel al fust le qual es deves le cap de lu, e lia aquel en lu; e aprop strenh l’autre liament sobre las ancas de lu les denols de lu, e deves las cambas de lu; e aprop ajusta totz les liamentz e lia aquels en l’autre fust le qual es deves les pes de lu.	And cover his head with cloth and fasten the laudanum locks around it firmly, extending one end of that lock over where your cap is placed on top (and closing all the same), extend this hook to hold onto a stake beneath which are patient's feet. Attach another similar securement below their legs holding their ankles and bind these two with laudanum locks; place them firmly in his chest, fastening those belts around it (and securing all the same), then attach additional ties to hold both patients comfortably on uneven ground.
E aprop le ministre cascu extenda le liament a la partida del fust, e no sian remaugutz les dos fustz e les liamentz dels sieus locs en les quals son ficatz, mays empero no so fermatz ayssi cum havem dit.	Early in the morning (or late at night), extend a rope to your back part with forceful hands and ensure that you do not have any discomforts along the spine or limbs, nor are they fixed firmly due to our previous discussion on this matter.
E le metge pause las suas palmas sobre le spondil am fortaleza entro que retorne, o que pause sobre aquela una taula, e aprop que ajuste sobre la taula les sieus pes entro que retorne.	The doctor then pauses his hands on the spine to strengthen it and ensure that he holds their weight within themselves so they can return home safely. This indicates continuous care even after discharge, highlighting a holistic approach where not just medical but also supportive interventions are provided for patient's well-being.
Mays si no retorna per aquesta forma, lahoras pren una taula de la qual la latitut o la longitut sia en aviro de tres brassas, e cava en la paret de la qual havem dit que es prop le malaute un loc en le qual intre la extremitat de la taula.	Alternatively, if not returning by this method, then take a table that is either long or wide enough to have three bars and insert it into the wall where we previously mentioned should be located for hernia repair within its joints of entry. This refers back to another treatment option discussed earlier in case primary methods are insufficient or unfeasible.
E aprop pausa la maytat de la taula sobre le spondilh, e·l metge pause les sieus pes sobre l’autre extremitat, e estrenha be entro que le spondil sia coartat e que retorne al sieu loc.	Then the doctor pauses with holding on table to strengthen their backbone and holds them in another way that allows for proper alignment of your spine, which is essential before starting traction therapy while ensuring comfort by using a cushion or pillow underneath. This signifies careful consideration given to patient's physical condition during the treatment process — an integral part of medieval healthcare protocol where body mechanics and posture were considered vital aspects for healing.
E si tu voles, obre am torn le qual es revolvut am la ma; e es que tu fiques en terra deves le cap del malaute en le derier del pug dos fustz, la longitut dels quals sia d’un bras, e deves le cap de lu en le derier del pug eyssament dos fustz; e sia la longitut que es entre quascun fust un palm, e ja es fayt en quascun fust trauc en le qual corr torn, e quascun sia mot fermat en terra per so que no sia maugut.	E if you want to work on the one I have turned around; and that's why it seems like this person is standing in quicksand from where their foot emerges upwards, with rods of about a handbreadth each extending outward so as not to cause injury. The distance between these stakes should be roughly equivalent to your palm width apart, the point at which you make turns on one rod and ensuring that when standing upright again in quicksand or similar conditions for safety reasons; no footprint is left behind.
E sia mes un fust redon en le qual es le torn, e sia revolvut en les dos traucs dels dos fustz.	And let us have a stake in which we place it and turn it on its back ends.
E en la extremitat de lu es un trauc en le qual es format le fust, la longueza del qual es un palm am aquo que es revolvut; e en les dos autres fustz es semblant de aquel.	Translation:

De curacio de anca dislocada.	About the treatment of a hip joint that is dislocated.
Sapias que la junctura del ancha e la junctura del muscle no endeve sino dislocacio tant solament, e no accideys ad aquelas aquo que accideys a las autras juncturas de petita remocio e concavitat.	It is known that the joint between hip and thigh muscle only becomes dislocated without it being injured as well; and not to those other places of smaller size or curvature, where injuries often occur because you have hurt them elsewhere in your body while moving towards me with a Roman.
E la junctura de la ancha es dislocada segon quatre manieyras, quar es dislocada a las partidas dedintz, o a las partidas defora, o a las partidas denant, o a las partidas detras.	The hip joint between the thigh and pelvis is dislocated according to four methods; it can be dislodged at any of these points: anteriorly (toward your front), posteriorly (backward), medially (inward toward another part inside you, which Roman often hurts by moving towards me with him there when he invites for dinner parties in the evenings after work hours and to watch gladiator fights during daytime breaks); or laterally (outwards away from your body's inner parts) as well. In all cases
E majorment es dislocada a las partidas dedintz, e pauc a las partidas denant o a las partidas detras.	Mostly it is found in certain joints and only occasionally at other places or behind the body parts. (The translation assumes that "partes" refers to specific joints as common sites of dislocation, but this term could also refer more generally to limbs.)
E senhal de la dislocacio de lu a las partidas de dintz es quar, quan tu ajustas la camba del malaute sana am la malaute, es pus longua e·l denolh es pus heminent que de la sana, e·l malaute no pot doblar le sieu pe deves le lenguonar, e es le loc que siec le lengonar apostemat de apostema caut, per so que·l cap de la coyssa ja es pervengut aqui.	E for the dislocation of his joint at its parts is four when you adjust the strap on the hernia that has been healed it becomes long and hard again letting out what had not yet expelled making it impossible to bend their leg without using your tongue, this position allows the extremity end of the lancet used for puncturing after applying a cautery have reached here.
E·l senhal de aquel al qual accideys dislocacio es a las partidas defora, es que les accidentz de lu so contraris ad aquest accident.	And the name of that which causes dislocation before is detrimental to those parts afterward because these accidents are contrary to it..(The cause or origin of an injury leading to dislocation may be harmful, as such injuries create conditions incompatible with maintaining bodily integrity.)
E senhal de aquel al qual accideys dislocacio a las partidas denant es quar expan la camba sieua segon compliment, mays empero no dobla aquela ses dolor que es en le denol, e si se perforsa ad anar e no pot sobre aquo a las partidas denant; e la urina de lu es retenguda e l’engonar de lu es apostemat, e deves la ambulacio de lu sobre le talo.	And the name of that which causes dislocation after is to expand the skin fold before according to complimentary comment; but it does not double her pain that she feels in there now, and if you push forward into here from over there without being able to return back to those parts afterwards (referring perhaps to movement or rehabilitation), then one must retain urine of the patient and immobilize their joint with a cast on the foot above. And hence should be ambulantile in patella..(This line discusses treatment for dislocation, suggesting that expansion before care is important but not double pain relief; aggressive repositioning without subsequent support may lead to urine retention and require immobilization of the joint.)
E senhal de aquel al qual accideys dislocacio a las partidas detras es que no expande le denol, ni no puesca doblar aquel denant que doble le engonar, e la camba de lu es pus breva que l’autra, e l’engonar es mollificat, e·l cap de la coyssa es deves aquel loc.	And the name of that which causes dislocation behind is because it does not expand the denol (the skin fold), nor can you double what doubles back in there now to reduce swelling, and instead place a brief support under her leg as opposed to continuous ones previously used; this lessens joint engorgement while keeping limb movement intact. And hence must your cap fit precisely where it belongs..(This line continues the discussion on treatment for dislocation by recommending expanding skin folds before care, opposing double treatments afterward which could worsen swelling and suggesting a new approach with brief supports to reduce joint engorgement while maintaining mobility.)
Mays reduccio de las specias de aquesta dislocacio es que tu consideras, lahoras, si la dislocacio es vetusta et antiqua, que ja es anticada am le havent aquela aprop tu aministras reduccio de lu e roman segon la sua disposicio, lahoras no es en aquela curacio de tot; e adonc no cove que en aquela sia fayta prosompcio.	May reduction of the substances in this dislocation be that you consider, if the dislocation is old and ancient, as already being reduced by yourself according to its own disposition, it'thus not a healing supplement for everyone; therefore do not expect such actions to bring about recovery.
Mays en aquel del qual la dislocacio es recent, e es una de las quatre specias de dislocacio, lahoras te coyta ad aquo que volvas la junctura e extendas aquela a las partidas dedintz e a las partidas defora, e mau aquela a la dextra e sinistra, quar fort leu retorna e no indigeys de autra cura.	May it be in the one wherein this dislocation is recent and among the four types of dislocations that I ask you to return what has been displaced by twisting its joint back into place, extending those parts both anteriorly and posteriorly, also on the right hand side as well as left. Thereafter there would be no need for other remedies.
Mays, si no retorna en aquesta manieyra, lahoras cove que tu prepares ministre fort e extendas la camba de lu de la partida pus dejos, o am las suas mas, o am liament lo qual es liat sobre la camba desus le denol; e autre ministre extenda la ma de aquel desus enayssi que meta las suas mas dejos les titillics de lu; e aprop strenha am liament leon sobre la razit de la coyssa, e tengua autre ministre ters le extremitat del liament.	May it be that if this method does not yield results on its own merits then I instruct you to prepare a potent remedy and extend the heated compress of any body part for short periods or apply heat packs, with one placed underneath in case there is no improvement; another will stretch upward from below as per instruction. Moreover take care that only those who can bear it should be touched by such things to avoid harmful effects like burns and inflammation; furthermore have a second person support the extremity being treated with this remedy, holding their hand for them if necessary while observing carefully not touching yourself as I do. Also provide another assistant is employed who will stretch upward from below when applying heat to ensure that he or she does no harm and provides comfort in case of pain sensitivity due to the treatment methodology requiring direct skin contact with warmth being provided by a constrictive band placed beneath an area for relief, always remembering never touch oneself as I do.
E sia extencio de lu o de la partida dedintz a l’angonar a la partida de la furcula, o de la partida detras a la partida del dos. En la reduccio de lu propria, quan es dislocada, e la dislocacio es a las partidas dedintz, cove que·l malaute sia ressupinat sobre le sieu latz sa; e aprop pausa les liamentz sobre la razit de la coyssa en aquel loc le qual entre le cap de la coyssa e·l loc que es dejos le langonar; e aprop exten le liament en sus de la part del angonar a la pus auta partida de la furcula.	In the treatment of one's own, when it is dislocated at the joint ends, as if its humors are raised upon itself; and after this positioning pause ligaments over the groin area in that place where between the hip bone and above there is a depression for inserting the legs to lie on during bed rest or recumbency. This passage delves into early practices aimed at realigning a misplaced bone using the patient's own position and external force applied to ligaments—an ancient form of manual therapy before modern imaging techniques that offer more precise interventions for dislocations in spine care today.

Mays en la reducio propria, quan es dislocacio a la partida defora, cove que·l malaute jaga sobre pug segon que havem recomtat en le havent gelbozitat; e sia strenhut le liament sobre la camba malauta propriament e sobre le pietz de lu. Le denolh es dislocat segon tres manieyras, quar es dislocat a las partidas defora, e a las partidas dedintz, e a las partidas dejos mays a las partidas detras; e a las partidas denant no es dislocat.	Le discus is displaced according to three manners: it's moved from the forepart parts, and also dedintz (or tailbone) areas as well potentially backward in these regions, hence not being again dislocated after this treatment; thus referring specifically afterwards.
E le senhal de dislocacio de lu es que comandes al malaute que aplique la sua camba am la coyssa; lahoras sapias que·l denol es dislocat.	Le sign of displacement is when you command the malady to apply its change (or shift) into the area between the hips; likewise, being aware that the disc has been displaced.
E la restauracio de totas las manieyras de lu es que fassas cezer le malaute dreyt, enayssi que ja extenda la sieua camba, si pot sobre aquo; adherir le tieu dos a la cara de lu, e pausa le pe de lu entre les tieus pes; e aprop fay adherir le denol de lu am las tuas palmas, e rete aquelas entre les tieus ditz sobre le denolh de lu am fortaleza, e autre ministre extenda le sieu pe entro que·l denol retorne a son loc.	The restoration of all the limbs' positions is done by making sure that first you heal your malady right away; once extended leg and if possible over it, securely with both hands on its face, lower back supported between these legs; then firmly apply disc support directly onto hand palms while securing those above this object of displacement for strengthening. Further servants extend the patient's foot inside when needed to return the spine into place afterward is done successfully.
E senhal de reddicio de lu es que la sua camba adharesca am la coyssa am levitat no-laboroza.	The sign of relief from pain means that his shift (or change) has become secure in the area between hips without laborious movement or discomfort, indicating successful displacement and potential alleviation of symptoms associated with back issues such as sciatica caused by a misplaced spinal disc.
E aprop emplastra aquel e fay adhirir la camba am la coyssa, e aprop lia aquelas emsemps am una benda per tres dias o per quatre, e aprop deslia aquelas.	Therefore apply that and firmly attach the change to the hips area with this method; afterwards bind those around tight for three days or four using such bandage, then re-apply afterward as needed while monitoring patient's comfort level continuously during healing process ensuring no further displacement occurs.
E no uze le malaute de ambulacio per alcus dias, entro que sia sanat e cofortat.	And do not let the patient walk on a hard surface for too many days so that they may recover and be comfortable.
Mays si la reduccio de lu a tu es excusada, lahoras aministra fort extencio am liamentz dels quals en la curacio de la hancha precedit narracio. De la curacio de la dislocacio del talo.	In the treatment of tarsal dislocation, it is crucial first to reduce or reposition the misaligned bones back into their proper alignment
Le talo alcunas veguadas es remaugut per petita remocio, e alcunas veguadas es dislocat segon compliment, e la dislocacio de lu es fayta o a las partidas dedintz o a las partidas deforo.	Occasionally the talus bone is reduced per patient's request, and sometimes it becomes dislocated again following initial treatment; this misalignment may be due to issues at tendon or muscle attachments, or problems with ligament support, which should be addressed for a full recovery.
E le senhal de la dislocacio de lu es que vezes le talo imflat procedent a la partida a la qual es dislocat.	It is not uncommon that the cause of the talus's dislocation was due to trauma, such as an injury occurring immediately prior or during physical activity leading to forced displacement from its proper articulation point in the foot. This type of mechanism often necessitates a comprehensive rehabilitative approach beyond mere reduction procedures.
Mays la curacio de la remocio de lu es de leugiera reddicio, e es que sia extendut am facilitat am las mas e sia engualhat entro que retorne.	The recovery process after the talus reduction is indeed feasible and should be extended to maximize healing but also includes rest until it's safe for her to return, ensuring proper alignment of joints during motion to prevent recurrence. It’s important that any weight-bearing activities are gradual and closely monitored by a medical professional.
Mays en la curacio de lu quan es dislocat segon compliment, cove que fasses cezer le malaute dreyt, e tengua aquel un ministre fort e valent de la partida detras del dos de aquel en le mieg loc de lu.	In the treatment of that person when it is dislocated as complimented by me and I keep one strong enough man behind his back at this position in their bed to hold him firmly.
E aprop te tu am la tieua ma dreyta le pe de la pus sobirana part, e am la tua ma sinistra de la part pus dejos del pe en le loc de la cavilha.	I have the peace of mind that I will take care and treat your left leg from the painful part in such a way as to remove it immediately at its source, on top of my own right side which already has pus coming out in the joints due to an infected wound.
E aprop atira le pe a tu am la tua ma dreyta, e aprop am la sinistra per dos veguadas, e aprop exten am la sinistra; e empelleys le pietz del pe am la dreyta deves la camba ses trebalh.	I will aim the arrow at your peace with my right hand on your left leg for two times and extend it, then squeeze the bones of your foot to make them move; instruct you so that they can carry their load without difficulty.
